Package metier.graphe.model.dao

Class PossedeDAO

java.lang.Object
metier.graphe.model.dao.DAO<metier.persistence.Possede>
metier.graphe.model.dao.PossedeDAO
public class PossedeDAO extends DAO<metier.persistence.Possede>
DAO class for managing the association between Secouriste and Competences. Handles the operations related to the Possede table.
